scripts.test: node scripts/change-env-values.js 3 && npx hardhat test && node scripts/change-env-values.js 0

scripts.deploy:prod: cp env-prod.json env.json && node scripts/change-env-values.js 0 && npx hardhat run --network polygon scripts/deploy.js
